includedAssets.title: The Purge
includedAssets.synopsis: A family are subjected to a night of terror when the government makes all crimes legal for 12 hours.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A family are subjected to a night of terror when the government makes all crimes legal for 12 hours.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A family are subjected to a night of terror when the government makes all crimes legal for 12 hours.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, violence

includedAssets.title: The Purge: Anarchy
includedAssets.synopsis: With all crime legal for one night, a group of strangers attempt to survive on the streets of Los Angeles. Dark thriller sequel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With all crime legal for one night, a group of strangers attempt to survive on the streets of Los Angeles. Dark thriller sequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With all crime legal for one night, a group of strangers attempt to survive on the streets of Los Angeles. Dark thriller sequel.

includedAssets.title: The Purge: Election Year
includedAssets.synopsis: The popular action-horror series returns for a third instalment, but does Purge night - during which all crime is legal - have a future? The presidential election is fast approaching and anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan (Elizabeth Mitchell) is gathering some serious momentum. She and her supporters see the barbaric annual event for what it is - a tool for the deeply corrupt NFFA (New Founding Fathers of America) to solidify their position of power and line their pockets at the expense of the poor. Essentially she's painted a giant target on her back and you can guess what time of year it is.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The presidential election is fast approaching, but can anti-Purge candidate Elizabeth Mitchell survive the night? Action-horror sequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The popular action-horror series returns for a third instalment, but does Purge night - during which all crime is legal - have a future? The presidential election is fast approaching and anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan (Elizabeth Mitchell) is gathering some serious momentum. She and her supporters see the barbaric annual event for what it is - a tool for the deeply corrupt NFFA (New Founding Fathers of America) to solidify their position of power and line their pockets at the expense of the poor. Essentially she's painted a giant target on her back and you can guess what time of year it is.

includedAssets.title: The Purge 3 Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: In a chilling future, the corrupt ruling regime in the US, the New Founding Fathers of America, makes all crime legal for a 12-hour period once a year. Ethan Hawke and Frank Grillo star in this unnerving action horror trio, including 2016's The Purge: Election Year.

includedIn.title: The Purge
includedIn.synopsis: In a dystopic America, carnage descends for 12 hours when all laws are suspended as part of the 'Purge'. Citizens are forced to protect themselves from onetime friends and neighbours, along with the sinister 'New Founding Fathers of America'.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: In a dystopic America, carnage descends for 12 hours when all laws are suspended as part of the 'Purge'.
